Body: I try to install xbox360 wireless controller for PC on my android device(android 4.0 or above). I have already copy Vendor_045e_Product_0719.kl file to /system/usr/keylayoutThen connect wireless receiver of controller to android device, in logcat output:06-05 00:05:53.626: E/NetlinkEvent(87): NetlinkEvent::FindParam(): Parameter 'INTERFACE' not found06-05 00:05:53.636: W/Vold(87): addMdmDev don't find a match usb device (45e_719) in isKnownMdmDevSo I think the receiver doesn't works in right way and controller can't works.How can I solve this?What do I want to do, please refer tohttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TrTmsZIb0a8
Title: xbox360 wireless controller on android
